TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProtocolImporter extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供跨通訊協定 (Protocol) 的通用功能，為 Web 服務產生類別。

span.span: Provides common functionality across communication protocols for generating classes for Web services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抽象類別和其實體衍生的類別產生用戶端 proxy 程式碼或抽象伺服端程式碼，根據指定的通訊協定。The abstract class and its concrete derived classes generate client proxy code or abstract server code according to a specified communication protocol. 提供一般功能，不論通訊協定。 provides common functionality regardless of the protocol. 中指定的通訊協定，具體衍生的類別會產生每個支援的繫結 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件中定義的類別。Within a given protocol, a concrete derived class generates a class for each supported binding defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 一般而言，而不是直接叫用類別衍生自，開發人員會使用間接透過這些類別類別。Typically, instead of directly invoking classes derived from , a developer uses these classes indirectly through the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AbstractSchemas As XmlSchemas
public: property System::Xml::Serialization::XmlSchemas ^ AbstractSchemas { System::Xml::Serialization::XmlSchemas ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得由相關聯 執行個體 (Instance) 使用的抽象 XML 結構描述。

value.span: 相關聯 執行個體所使用的抽象 XML 結構描述。

span.span: The abstract XML schemas used by the associated instance

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddExtensionWarningComments(class System.CodeDom.CodeCommentStatementCollection comments, class System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection extensions) cil managed
Public Sub AddExtensionWarningComments (comments As CodeCommentStatementCollection, extensions As ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection)

param.name: comments
param.span: ，指定每個警告訊息加入至的程式碼註解集合。

span.span: A that specifies the collection of code comments to which each warning message is added.

param.name: extensions
param.span: ，指定擴充功能或 XML 項目，如果未處理這些擴充功能或 XML 項目，則應產生警告。

span.span: A that specifies the extensions or XML elements for which warnings should be generated if they are not handled.

summary.span: 對於輸入擴充集合中的每個未處理擴充功能或 XML 項目，開啟 或 警告。

span.span: For each unhandled extension or XML element in the input extensions collection, turns on a or warning for each unhandled extension or XML element in the input extensions collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法也會將警告訊息加入至程式碼註解的集合。This method also adds the warning messages to a collection of code comments.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration BeginClass() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function BeginClass () As CodeTypeDeclaration

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，初始化繫結類別的產生。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, initializes the generation of a binding class.
The generated class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生指定的繫結的類別時類別會呼叫方法，然後再產生對應至作業的方法。When generating a class for a given binding, the class calls the method before generating methods that correspond to operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void BeginNamespace() cil managed

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，執行程式碼產生期間的命名空間 (Namespace) 範圍初始化。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, performs namespace-wide initialization during code generation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生程式碼中時,類別會呼叫方法，然後再產生代表繫結的類別。When generating code, the class calls the method before generating classes that represent bindings.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsBindingSupported() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function IsBindingSupported () As Boolean

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，判斷是否可產生目前繫結的類別。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, determines whether a class can be generated for the current binding.

returns.span: 如果支援繫結則為 true，否則為 false。

span.span: True if the binding is supported; otherwise false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生程式碼中時,類別會呼叫方法，以判斷是否要產生目前的繫結的類別所表示的屬性。When generating code, the class calls the method to determine whether to generate a class for the current binding, as represented by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsOperationFlowSupported(valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow flow) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function IsOperationFlowSupported (flow As OperationFlow) As Boolean

param.name: flow
param.span: 表示傳送模式的 列舉值。

span.span: An enumeration value that represents a transmission pattern.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，判斷是否支援目前作業的作業流程。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, determines whether the current operation's operation flow is supported.

returns.span: 如果支援目前作業的作業流程，則為 true。

span.span: True if the current operation's operation flow is supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生程式碼中時,類別會呼叫方法，以判斷是否要產生目前作業，方法所表示的屬性。When generating code, the class calls the method to determine whether to generate a method for the current operation, as represented by the property. 這項評估會每個作業進行中的繫結所產生的類別。This evaluation takes place for each operation in a binding for which a class is being generated. 如果`false`傳回值，類別會呼叫其方法。If a `false` value is returned, the class calls its method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. 屬性是 型別。The property is of type .
